n31.name: Normality
n31.type: Unplayable.You cannot play more than 3 cards this turn.

n32.name: Pain
n32.type: Unplayable.While in hand, lose 1 HP when other cards are played.

n33.name: Parasite
n33.type: Unplayable.If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.

n34.name: Regret
n34.type: Unplayable.At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand.
